price: E, com efeito, concedemos ciência a Davi e a Salomão. E disseram ambos: "Louvor a Allah, que nos preferiu a muitos de Seus servos crentes."
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ عِلۡمٗاۖ وَقَالَا ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٖ مِّنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā dāwūda wasulaymāna ʿil'man waqālā al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī faḍḍalanā ʿalā kathīrin min ʿibādihi al-mu'minīna
